text_block_list.name: Male Announcer
text_block_list.text: —— The Sacred Equine Relay's climatic festival race, the Dash of Remembrance, will soon be underway.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: —— I'ma say this now I can. Inari, I wouldn't be standing here if it weren't for your pep talk back then. 'Preciate it, f'real.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Don't need no thanks. All I wanted was to liven up the Relay. Ya wanna repay me, just show me some class runnin'!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ya bet! Ain't gonna lose, y'hear? 'Cause victory wishes're riding on me today, now'at I'm a Sacred Equine!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Heh, I got wishes ridin' on me too, those cryin' out to have their existence known. An' I'm carryin' them as a Sacred Equine! Gon' make sure nobody forgets them, in style!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: —— I will become a Sacred Equine on behalf of all horsegirls who ran for those who cheered them on.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: And I will carry that will, that prayer, from here and now into the future……! Tama, Inari… I will not be defeated either.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …… Well ain't we all fired up. C'mon, it's near time.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: —— Hear now, hear now! O flames! Ye gathered here! O pillars trine!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Lend thine ears and eyes to this night!!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: From ages past to end of days, our Sacred Equine Relay runs!

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: —— Here, in remembrance we run, spinning a thread eternal!!

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: —— Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!!

text_block_list.name: Male Announcer
text_block_list.text: Their zeal is incredible! With ferocity rivaling a competitive race, the excitement is palpable in the audience!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: (Ancestors, seniors, you watchin'…?! This is me! This is us!!)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: (We're the horsegirls inheriting your prayers, carryin' your wishes 'n memory into the future we run toward…!!)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (I won't let them be in vain! I won't let them be forgotten!! Y'alls feelings, the time y'all ran! I'll shout out loud that y'all still live on, right here!!)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (Not through words but through running!! We'll show that you lot ran this earth!!)

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: (A lot of horsegirls have run before us! And a lot will run after! We will continue to run…… horsegirls will continue to run!!)

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: —— Ooooooohh!!!!

text_block_list.name: Male Announcer
text_block_list.text: The line at the foot is in sight! Which Sacred Equine will reach it first!?

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: —— That Dash was amazing. I'm so happy I came to watch. …… I sorta have this strange feeling now.

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, me too. There's a…… warmth, in my chest. ……… I wanna give it all I got in training tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: —— My next race… I'm, like, so winning～!

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text: Girl, real?! I was lowkey thinking the same thing! I wanna run so bad right now!

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— You all have delivered exemplary work as Sacred Equines. I offer you my utmost gratitude.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: Hearts entwine, feelings run loose, and make their return. I pray all of you may find prosperity in your futures ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Well'en, cheers to a successful Relay ——

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Cheeeers!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Nah f'real, I wasn't sure how it'd pan out at one point but getting to celebrate this way's great. One more time, to a job done well, friends! 'N thanks!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: It was difficult but really fun. ……I'm glad that I was able to be a Sacred Equine with everyone here.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: We learned about a lotta important stuff an' received a bunch. Even now I'm feelin' them flames burn in my heart.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: I am certain all the other horsegirls out there can feel their warmth, and…… undoubtedly a new warmth, a new memory, will spring from them.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: As we continue to run, the feelings we encounter, our memory… I firmly believe they'll be carried on by someone in the future.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Sorta… gives you courage, don't it?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: I reckon our threads will become entwined the same way. With the past, the present, an' the future, by runnin' ——

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm excited to see…… what the future holds.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yeah. ………Yeah, f'sure, but y'know ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: —— We still got our "present", right now. Don'tcha think it's too early to be thinking 'bout the future?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Ha-hah, no kiddin'! We gotta run through the present in style if we wanna bring about an excitin' future!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I wish for nothing else. We'll give our all to brighten our time in the "present".

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I will be with you all the way, running in the same "present", and we will have the future bear witness to the path we ran.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: …… We'll run. As far as we can, for as long as we can.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: That's what makes us…… horsegirls.

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Run on, O horsegirls, run on. From ages past to end of days. Thread our memory forevermore ——
